casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Caudy ANTOINE. No. 482P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 6, 2004. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Edward W. Grannis, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

*674The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th day of September 2004 by Defendant for Relief:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of October 2004."
